text:
e="preserve">Sun Qiaolu (12 June, 1995 – 1 January, 2021) was a Chinese actress. Sun appeared in the Chinese children’s TV series "Ba La La Little Demon Fairy" as the fairy Ling Meiqi. After the show ended, she was in the fashion business and became a social media influencer.
Sun died of a heart attack on 1 January, 2021, aged 25.
